attributes.action: The Static Caravan Holiday Homes Industry needs Legislative Laws in place.
attributes.additional_details:
A multi-million pound, Consumer Industry with no current legislation in place is allowing the Consumers, 
to be misled and mis-sold at great cost both monetarily and mentally.Clear, concise and transparent information is NOT always given at point of sale and 
Caravan Owners are left to fend for themselves when things are not going right, 
with no Legal Governing body or specific laws in place to help them.
attributes.background:
The Static Caravan Holiday Homes Industry needs Legislative Laws in place with stricter regulations, to protect the 
Caravan Owners, (Consumers), against the current unfair practices that are consistently 
active on many of the Static Caravan Holiday Parks throughout the United Kingdom.
